ObjectClass.Name: Importer
ObjectClass.Description:
IMPORTER:
Resource generation and infantry production building
Imports RESERVES (pilots human units) Regenerates HP and LC

Objective.Name: Create Support-Marine
Objective.Details: \Light skirmisher combat-technician \Repairs damaged units and structures \Cloaks while stationary \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Create Assault-Marine
Objective.Details: \Close combat heavy-infantry \Upgradeable to cloak during combat \Invisible in Fog of War

ObjectClass.Name: Importer (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Importer is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
